titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: jan 7 = "Musion"? s3: Feb 4 = "Mummery"? s4: top right of card = note in French, can't decipher

body.ab:
1922 Jan 7 Miss Martin Hotel Lutetia (719 room) Les 4 vents Bd Raspuil near Varengeville s/ Mer, Seine Inférieurs Pourville 1 mo 1 vol 8 Dep 7
Jan 7 The Worlds 2 vols Jan. 11th Jan 11th Growth of the Soil Jan 14 Jan 14 The Stucco House Jan 16 Jan 16 Regiment of Women Jan 18 Jan 18 Under Western Eyes Jan 21 Jan 21 Erewhon Jan 28 Jan 28 Dubliners Feb 2 Feb 2 Outline of History (0.15 a day) 7 = 1f.05 Feb. 9 Renewed Feb. 9 Ditte, Daughter of Man Feb 13. 1 month to Feb. 13 The Untilled Field " 15 March 8th = 8f Feb. 15. White Peacock given back Private Character of Queen E Mars 1 deposit Feb 29 Henry James, Rebecca West Mar 15 wants Nietzsche's Letters Mar. 27 Mar. 27 Nov. 6 Renewed for 1 m 2 vols 16f. no deposit Letters of Tchekov Nov 19 Bliss " " Nov. 19 The Garden Party Nov 28 post Byron's Correspondance vol I " " 1.90 Nov 18 Byron " vol II Dec 11 post. 2.05 " " The Judge " " (Dec 7 received 4 frs in stamps)

1 fortnight 12.50 Deposit 50
Dec 8 Second Empire Dec 13 Dec 13 Wedlock. _ 15 _ 15 Juno Dec 20 1927 March 19th. S.R. to 3 m 2 vols 85 Deposit 100 See new fiche

1 mo. 1 vol. 8 Dep 7
